ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months, have you smoked cannabis?
In the last 12 months, have you smoked cannabis before midday (noon)?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= From Time to Time; 3= Fairly Often; 4= Very Often; 999= Skipped

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months, have you smoked cannabis when you were alone?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= From Time to Time; 3= Fairly Often; 4= Very Often; 999= Skipped

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months, have you had memory problems when you smoked cannabis?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= From Time to Time; 3= Fairly Often; 4= Very Often; 999= Skipped

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months, have friends or members of your family told you that you ought to reduce your cannabis use?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= From Time to Time; 3= Fairly Often; 4= Very Often; 999= Skipped

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months, have you tried to reduce or stop your cannabis use without succeeding?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= From Time to Time; 3= Fairly Often; 4= Very Often; 999= Skipped

ElementDescription: In the last 12 months, have you had problems because of your use of cannabis (argument, fight, accident, bad result at school, etc.)?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= From Time to Time; 3= Fairly Often; 4= Very Often; 999= Skipped

ElementDescription: Have you had problems because of your use of cannabis (argument, fight, accident, bad result at school, etc.)?
What problems have you had as a result of your cannabis use?

Notes: Total sum of cast_1 to cast_6
